game.name: EG Sky Troops
game.description:
Your sky is not your place to fly anymore! Many unknown missiles and enemy obstacles have invaded your place. You as an expert pilot have decided to face them off and clear your area from all the uninvited enemies. Do you think that you can manage such a big challenge right away? Join EG Sky Troops and get ready to fight in a sky like never before! The number of enemies is very big. You do not have to fight only against the enemy planes, but also rescue the innocent people. 

The only way to unblock the next level is to complete the current mission. Remember, the higher level you reach, the stronger enemies you will have to face off. It is wise to practice your aeroplane flying skills in advance to complete your mission in each level in this one of the best adventure games for boys. Your every successful effort will help you grab some coins and money through which you can upgrade your weapons and plane to destroy your enemy planes with ease. 

Operate your plane like a champion to clear all stages in this free html5 flying game! You can enjoy this fun plane challenge in all the modern browsers for free, no download required. It is created with the help of html5 technology, which allows it to be played on android phones, iPhones and iPads apart from the desktop and laptop computers. Enjoy this and many more challenging and engaging free games on atmegame.com!!
